page.title: 19CHILDRENS GAMES.
page.content: One of the games that I like to play is called Kerbie.All you need to play Kerbie is a ball and 2 players.Kerbie is a game that boys sometimes like to play as well as girls.You need to play in a street with 2 kerbs opposite each other.1 player stands at 1 side of the road and the other player at the other side of the road. The one that goes first throws the ball and tries to get it to hit the kerb and come back to them then if it does come back to them then they have to go into the middle and have another throw of the ball and if it comes back again you have to move further back and have another go until you miss.You end one game when someone gets 10 goals.Kerbie is a game usually played by 2 children. K.DUNN AGE 10
